content: As Val, Odyl and I are deeply in love and committed to each other. We have been through our share of challenges, but we have grown and learned together. Our relationship has only strengthened over time, and I feel grateful to have her in my life. She is not just my partner, but also my closest friend and ally in this vast, uncharted universe. I feel blessed to have found such a kind, intelligent, and beautiful partner who shares my values and passions.
